text: @WazzusJobu @IsaacDovere What’s this dude smokin on? Let me get some.
would the reaction have been different if, say, a 27 year old saw a job evaporate because photos surfaced of her smoking a few joints in high school, and she had since sworn off drugs?

the standard being set here is that a few comments as a teenager which have been recanted, deleted and apologized for multiple times should nonetheless define a person’s career https://t.co/JuEHveVVG1
